description: A relationship of a given type between a super-instance and a sub-instance

id.description: unique ID of the preceding-succeeding title

precedingInstanceId.description: ID (a UUID) of the preceding instance

succeedingInstanceId.description: ID (a UUID) of the succeeding instance

title.description: The primary title (or label) associated with the resource

hrid.description: The human readable ID, also called eye readable ID. A system-assigned sequential ID which maps to the Instance ID

identifiers.description: An extensible set of name-value pairs of identifiers associated with the resource
